author: mwjeth
content:
if anyone wants to be added to the Fusaka Hoodi watch event zoom that we (Ethstaker) are doing starting today at <t:1761675780:f> in <t:1761675780:R>, send me your email or I can DM you the agenda which has the details.

if anyone wants to take the mic, let me know on these:
- outline the key EIPs, particularly the big ones
- a commentator during the fork time to narrate a Dora the Explorer page

author: misilva73
content:
Hi everyone! 
The agenda for tomorrow's Repricing Breakout call is here: https://github.com/ethereum/pm/issues/1784
We will have a quick intro and then do a deep dive on 5 EIPs (mostly state related). I linked the EIP's champion in the agenda. I will ask each champion to quickly present the EIP and we can then gather some feedback. If you cannot attend, please make sure to ask someone else to cover for you.

author: barnabasbusa
content:
The hoodi fork is in <t:1761677592:R>. Please make sure your nodes are updated to the latest release of your client!

In case there are issues, we will meet in the voice channel on the eth R&D discord server: <#814925424726900766> 

Tools for debugging:
https://dora.hoodi.ethpandaops.io/
https://forky.hoodi.ethpandaops.io/
https://tracoor.hoodi.ethpandaops.io/
Lab: https://lab.ethpandaops.io/xatu-data?network=hoodi
